title: lastdance9393
author: lastdance9393
content: hey , im your vip client from your product. your stuff is acting me like a shit. i lost more then millions and they are not allowed me to bet 2btc in biggest sports event formula 1. dont tell around you are a fair bookie. when i win they limit my winnings competitions even your team is telling me what should i bet and lost. well done mate. you have an amazing team. very fair bookie. yoıu have the most useless trading team ever.

comments.author: Fortify
comments.body: Quote from: lastdance9393 on June 18, 2023, 04:53:38 PMhey , im your vip client from your product. your stuff is acting me like a shit. i lost more then millions and they are not allowed me to bet 2btc in biggest sports event formula 1. dont tell around you are a fair bookie. when i win they limit my winnings competitions even your team is telling me what should i bet and lost. well done mate. you have an amazing team. very fair bookie. yoıu have the most useless trading team ever.  So, there is no real complaint here. You have not lost any actual money, just your perceived winnings from not being able to wager at your desired level, which a bookmaker is under no obligation to fulfill? What a joke of an "accusation".

comments.author: JeromeTash
comments.body: Quote from: lastdance9393 on June 18, 2023, 04:53:38 PMhey , im your vip client from your product. your stuff is acting me like a shit.Perhaps because of your attitude?Quotei lost more then millions and they are not allowed me to bet 2btc in biggest sports event formula 1. You lost more than a million in valid bets, right? Did they scam you?If they don't allow you to bet more than 2 BTC, then how is it a problem? If you think the limit was too low for you, then why not look for alternatives.Quote dont tell around you are a fair bookie. when i win they limit my winnings competitions even your team is telling me what should i bet and lost. Casinos are a business in case you didn't know, and the limiting happens all the time. If you think the limiting is unfair, then I suggest you should stop gamblingThis is in no way a scam accusation, as Sportsbet did not scam you.

comments.author: Hhampuz
comments.body: If you lost more than millions already you should thank them for limiting your account.. Usually the story goes the other way around where someone is deep in red and they keep getting enticing bonuses to keep losing.Kudos to sportsbet (if true), for dealing with a problematic gambler.

comments.author: holydarkness
comments.body: Quote from: lastdance9393 on June 18, 2023, 04:53:38 PMhey ,Hi, I'm not related to SportsBet at any degree, obviously, but I can understand your frustration as a vvip member. Do you mind to give a tad bit more of patience while I am trying to hail someone from SB to look into your case more closely? I am PMing them right now and hopefully they'll attend to it soonest they can.

comments.author: robelneo
comments.body: The guy is obviously a compulsive gambler, he wants his way and will not accept casinos' decision to limit or stop him he prefers to go here than ask the casino's support why he is limited.These newbies are abusing the scam section totally ignoring this section's purpose and not following the right format.They just want to give the casino a bad reputation even though they know that this will not consider a scam accusation because OP did not lose money, he is so sure that he can win if he is not limited so he thinks he is going to lose money.
